morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (the same as Active)
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.genderExplained: they are female or take a feminine form
morphInfos.description: something of a woman that _is doing_
morphInfos.explanation: an action that is happening - done by a female person or thing that something belongs to
